[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@firebase/database](./database.md) &gt; [child](./database.child.md)

## child() function

Gets a `Reference` for the location at the specified relative path.

The relative path can either be a simple child name (for example, "ada") or a deeper slash-separated path (for example, "ada/name/first").

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function child(parent: DatabaseReference, path: string): DatabaseReference;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  parent | [DatabaseReference](./database.databasereference.md) | The parent location. |
|  path | string | A relative path from this location to the desired child location. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[DatabaseReference](./database.databasereference.md)

The specified child location.
